Introduction

Hendery is a Chinese-Macanese rapper and singer-songwriter under SM Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group NCT and NCT U its Chinese sub-unit WayV. He is also one-half of WayV's pre-debut subunit duo WayV-LUCAS&HENDERY.
